Security 2D 		 +1D/+2D Normal Stormtroopers too easy? This is the stormtrooper the empire uses in its promotional propaganda vids.

Choose one:
* E-11 Blaster Carbine (5D Dam, +2D if aimed, Range 30/100/250, Ammo 100)
* DLT-20A “longblaster” Blaster Rifle (5D+2 Dam, +2D if aimed, Range 30/100/350, Ammo 50)
* FC1 Flechette Launcher (Dam: 0-1m-8D/3m-7D/5m-5D, Range 25/100/250, Ammo 6)

- 2 Stun Grenades (5D Stun Dam, 7/20/40, Stormtroopers are immune to these)
- LXR-6 concussion grenade (5D Dam, 7/20/40)
-Baradium-core thermal detonator:(Timer 6 - 18 sec, range of 5 meters Dam 50, must have code)
- Stormtrooper Armor (Advanced Breathing Filters, Electrobinoculars, Comlink, 20 minute air & heat)
- Two grappling hooks, and 20 meters high-tension wire.
- Glowrod
- 4 spare blaster power packs
- 3 ion flares
- Energy rations and water packs
- Spare comlink
- 2 combat medpacs.
- Binders
- Spare armor power cells
- Blaster/Armor Tool kit
